revised_title: An Investigation into the Properties and Effects of Malvern Water
tldr: The author, J. Wall, examines the properties and effects of the Holy Well water at Malvern, Worcestershire, and shares his observations on its chemical composition, therapeutic uses, and potential limitations. The water is found to be remarkably pure, light, and free from earth and salts, but also contains some volatile substances and minerals that may contribute to its healing properties.
